sentences.French: J'aurais aimé aller à la fête.
sentences.English: I would have liked to go to the party.
I would like to buy a car.

sentences.French: J'ai envie de manger du pain chaud.
sentences.English: I want to eat hot bread.

sentences.French: Tu as envie de venir avec moi?
sentences.English: Do you want to come with me?

sentences.French: Je veux prendre un verre d'eau.
sentences.English: I want to take a glass of water.
I would like to have more money.
